definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: Get a Cadaver to grab and kill a Haunted. (Ch. 2)
sentences.chinese: 在第二章中，用尸体抓住并杀掉一只“闹鬼”。

sentences.english: Did the authorities kill them because they'd eaten human flesh?
sentences.chinese: 当局有没有因为它们吃了人肉而把它们杀掉？

sentences.english: You get ambushed and kill the ambushers.
sentences.chinese: 你被突袭了，然后杀掉突袭者。

sentences.english: But you will wind up killing one person walking on the other track.
sentences.chinese: 但你就会杀掉走在另一条铁轨上的那一个人。

sentences.english: He focused by thinking how much he would like to kill the man he drew.
sentences.chinese: 他多想杀掉画中人，他靠着这种想法来集中精力。

sentences.english: When was the last time you wanted to kill someone?
sentences.chinese: 你最近一次想杀掉谁是什么时候的事？

sentences.english: Sadly there is no question as to whether or not a demigod can be slain.
sentences.chinese: 至于半神能否被杀掉的问题已经无需再问。

sentences.english: Your Evil side wishes to dominate Sanctuary and Kill Athena.
sentences.chinese: 你的邪恶面希望杀掉雅典娜，统治圣域。

sentences.english: In fact, he sympathized with one of the prisoners for killing the rancor beast.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，他很同情死囚中那位杀掉兰克兽的人。

sentences.english: LiBiao resolution with SanYing privately turned to kill leopards ditch LinZhenHai.
sentences.chinese: 李彪决议带着三营私自转到豹子沟杀掉林振海。

sentences.english: He didn't slaughter the cow until he had finished his grisly feast.
sentences.chinese: 把他那道可怕的菜吃完，他才杀掉那头牛。

sentences.english: To kill the deer would require catching the fish.
sentences.chinese: 要杀掉那头鹿，便得先捕捉那尾鱼。

sentences.english: Fang makes up his mind to kill him.
The legend of Robin Hood is re-written as the BBC kills off the heroine in the Holy Land.
sentences.chinese: 罗宾汉传奇随着BBC在圣地杀掉了女主角被改写。

sentences.english: Outlaws stole the cattle and were not averse to killing the men driving them.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒偷牛并乐意杀掉驱赶牛的人。

definition: an execution/to put sb to death
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
